page.title: 08Mayor Visits School
page.content: On Friday the Mayor came to visit us at school.A chauffeur brought him in a Volvo and he came in the classroom and sat down .The Mayoress came as well She sat next to Mr Johns and the Mayor had a scarlet robe and a gold belt and gold necklace.He said he lived at the Manor.He is the first Mayor of Bury to live in the country.The Mayor said he didn't belong to a party he said he was independent.A Mayor is in charge of Council meetings.He decides who talks next.To become a Councillor you have to get votes from the village. The Council looks after the village and all its services.To become the Mayor you have to be voted for by the Councillors. He said that he enjoys meeting lots of different people.He does not enjoy having to attend noisy functions with bands and things like that,however.
